description: Gets operating information about a wireless device.

parameters.name: WirelessDeviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the wireless device for which to get the data.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the wireless device.

nested_items.name: LastUplinkReceivedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the most recent uplink was received.

nested_items.name: DevEui
nested_items.description: The DevEUI value.

nested_items.name: FPort
nested_items.description: The FPort value.

nested_items.name: DataRate
nested_items.description: The DataRate value.

nested_items.name: Frequency
nested_items.description: The device's channel frequency in Hz.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time of the metadata.

nested_items.name: Gateways
nested_items.description: Information about the gateways accessed by the device.

nested_items.name: GatewayEui
nested_items.description: The gateway's EUI value.

nested_items.name: Snr
nested_items.description: The SNR value.

nested_items.name: Rssi
nested_items.description: The RSSI value.

nested_items.name: PublicGateways
nested_items.description: Information about the LoRaWAN public network accessed by the device.

nested_items.name: ProviderNetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the LoRaWAN public network provider.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the gateways that are operated by the network provider.

nested_items.name: Rssi
nested_items.description: The RSSI (received signal strength indicator) value.

nested_items.name: Snr
nested_items.description: The SNR (signal to noise ratio) value.

nested_items.name: RfRegion
nested_items.description: The frequency band (RFRegion) value.

nested_items.name: DlAllowed
nested_items.description: Boolean that indicates whether downlink is allowed using the network.

nested_items.name: Rssi
nested_items.description: The RSSI value.

nested_items.name: BatteryLevel
nested_items.description: Sidewalk device battery level.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: Sidewalk device status notification.

nested_items.name: DeviceState
nested_items.description: Device state defines the device status of sidewalk device.
